body.name: Furologee 4 Drawers Dresser for Bedroom, Small White Dresser with Shelf, Nightstand Side Table for Entryway, Living Room, Lightweight Fabric Storage Drawer Organizer Unit, Wood Top, Metal Frame
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 57 mins
features: [Multi-functional]: The dresser for bedroom is consist of 3-Tiers shelf, which is durable and easy to clean, 4 drawers made of linen fabric drawers(NOT WOOD DRAWER), which is more durable than non-woven fabrics. It is lightweight and stable, you can use it for cupboard for kitchen, nightstand for bedroom, side table for entryway, dresser for closet. This dresser can meet all of your needs.

[Sturdy and Durable]: The small dresser is made of metal frame and MDF shelf for added sturdiness and durability. The wood board is waterproof, you can wipe it directly with a wet cloth. The load capacity of every shelf is 40 lbs, it can be safely to placed lamps, microwave ovens and printers.
[Wide Storage Capacity]: Overall Measures 28.3" (W) x 11.4" (D) x 31.8" (H) ,and the height between the shelf is 9’’ , the drawer dimension is 12.5’’(L) x 11’’(W) x 6.8 ‘’(H）

[Retro industrial style]: This vintage storage dresser combines with classic wood grain and tiger stripes fabric drawer, easy to match other furniture and decor. And it's not only a multi-functional sideboard but also an home decoration.

[Portable & Easy to Assemble]: The package includes all the tools and accessories, you can install it in 20 minutes with the instruction. If you have any question about the installation, please feel free to contact with our customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy
reviews.reviewText: This was pretty easy to put together, as the directions are pretty straightforward. I would strongly recommend finding your own tool to use for tightening everything, as the included allen wrench is not the greatest. I had a screwdriver with many bits that had one that fit the screws perfectly, making putting this together super quick and easy. Pretty sturdy, and looks nicely in my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it! Read the review
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am totally satisfied with the final product of the three pieces that I bought on Amazon, which I made a very affordable bedroom set, all three pieces for less than $400, I made a bedroom set, the large bed and the nightstand, and the EnHomee Dresser TV. Stand Entertainment Center everything is beautiful I loved it. The bed: it is very good quality of strong iron The nightstand: very good size, I love how fine, delicate and pretty it looks, too. EnHomee Dresser TV Stand Entertainment Center, very good size and quality, I loved it, thank you Amazon! And before I forget, there is a wide variety of furniture that you can choose from and you can make your own bedroom set, there are many beautiful pieces that you can put together and form to your shape and style. and good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product, not so excellent assemble instructions
reviews.reviewText: This little dresser is very well constructed, the packaging is suburb, the screws etc are nicely labeled and packed, the parts are labeled and the check in sheet is easy to understand. The assembly instructions leave some room for improvement as it's totally pictures, no verbiage and as such needs some addential marking such as top and bottom, direction facing. I am not a novice but still had to take it apart twice to get the guesswork correct. You can't always guess correctly which direction the picture means the piece is facing, some text or addition marking would assist. Overall, a great product but if you're a novice .... get some help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly were I need it! Wish the drawers were a little bigger but it works for the purpose needed! Highly recommend.Easy to assemble. Good value for price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect as a bedside table. The drawers are deep, and sturdy despite being fabric drawers. This piece was easy to put together, very sturdy after being built. I have about 20 books on it and there’s no bending in the shelves. I like that the back of the shelves have a small bar across them so things can be pushed to the back without falling behind the shelf. I have cats that jump all on it and knock things off all the time but the side table itself never wobbles. The color is very nice and the frame is solid metal and the shelves are wooden. It’s a great option for a small bedroom, dorm room or just an entryway shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Simple to put together. Solidly built. Sturdy, strong and looks great.Customer service is A+. I had two bolts/nuts, the teeny tiny ones for a handle that are easy to thread badly. I could not fit these little nuts into the little bolts. Thus one drawer was without a handle. I wanted the bolts/nuts to match so I emailed Furologee to ask if I could get more from them. They asked for my receipt copy, my name and address and with no further to-do sent replacements to me. A public thank you.There are dozens of companies selling similar looking, possibly less expensive, furniture. However, I'm getting ready to buy two more matching pieces...from Furologee, a company that I trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in my room
reviews.reviewText: For a long while I've been searching for a new dresser to replace the one I had in the corner of my room, it was a night stand but had no space at all. I needed more space and storage. Originally I was gonna go for a different dresser that matched my actual night stand that's next to my bed but it was no longer available. So I had to look around again and came across this one and I actually liked the build instead of the original one I looked at. It has shelves on one side and dresser on the next. It is perfect in my room and actually looks nice, it made more space in my room and made it look more spacious. This item is skinny but has enough storage space and isn't too tall either. I still have one empty space for either books or clothing. The shelves and the top part of the dresser are made from wood while the boxes themselves are actually that fabric type of boxes. I thought it was going to be wood as well based on the images but they are fabric, but it isn't a problem for me but maybe for others it might. It still looks nice to me. Definitely worth the purchase and worth the wait.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is way smaller than I expected.
reviews.reviewText: Thankfully when we bought this we didn't have much room but it's teeny tiny. It's holding up, sturdy and all, just small.
